objects.specification: A flat floor surface rendered in a light, nearly white color. The material should have a subtle texture and a slight matte finish to reflect minimal glare, suitable for a bright classroom environment.
A flat ceiling panel painted in a clean, white hue. The surface should be smooth with a subtle matte finish and minimal architectural details.
A smooth, vertical wall surface coated in a crisp, light neutral paint. The panel should be flat, with sharp edges and minimal trim to create a modern interior appearance.
A smooth, vertical wall surface coated in a crisp, light neutral paint. The panel should be flat, with sharp edges and minimal trim to create a modern interior appearance.
A smooth, vertical wall surface coated in a crisp, light neutral paint. The panel should be flat, with sharp edges and minimal trim to create a modern interior appearance.
A smooth, vertical wall surface coated in a crisp, light neutral paint. The panel should be flat, with sharp edges and minimal trim to create a modern interior appearance.

A substantial rectangular teacher’s desk crafted from dark wood with a rich grain texture. It features a polished top surface, modesty panel, and sturdy square legs, conveying a professional and durable design suitable for a classroom setting.

An ergonomic teacher chair with a padded seat and backrest upholstered in a complementary soft fabric. The chair has a swivel base, adjustable height, and caster wheels, offering comfort and mobility.
A large rectangular whiteboard with a glossy white surface. It has a thin anodized metal frame and rounded corners, providing a clean and modern writing surface for classroom instruction.

A compact ceiling-mounted projector with a clean, neutral-colored casing. The front features a prominent lens and subtle ventilation grilles, designed for ceiling installation and projection onto a whiteboard.
A tall, multi-shelf bookshelf crafted from medium-toned wood with visible grain. Each shelf is filled with assorted books of varying heights and colors, creating a rich and educational display.
A tall, multi-shelf bookshelf crafted from medium-toned wood with visible grain. Each shelf is filled with assorted books of varying heights and colors, creating a rich and educational display.
A large rectangular window with a slim white frame and clear glass panes. The glass should have slight reflectivity and transparency to allow natural light into the space.
A fabric curtain panel with gentle draping folds in a soft, neutral pastel color. The material has a slight sheen and realistic creases, hanging from an implied rod above.
A fabric curtain panel with gentle draping folds in a soft, neutral pastel color. The material has a slight sheen and realistic creases, hanging from an implied rod above.
A round wall clock with a clean white face, bold black numerals, and slim black hands. It has a thin metallic bezel and minimalistic design for clear, quick time reading.
A colorful educational poster with high-resolution graphics and text illustrating classroom content. The poster is printed on glossy paper and is unframed with sharp edges.
A colorful educational poster with high-resolution graphics and text illustrating classroom content. The poster is printed on glossy paper and is unframed with sharp edges.
A small waste bin made of molded plastic in a neutral grey tone. The shape is cylindrical with a slightly tapered profile and a smooth matte finish.
A small waste bin made of molded plastic in a neutral grey tone. The shape is cylindrical with a slightly tapered profile and a smooth matte finish.
A potted indoor plant with lush green foliage and natural leaf variances. The plant rests in a simple ceramic pot with a subtle neutral glaze, adding organic warmth to the environment.
A potted indoor plant with lush green foliage and natural leaf variances. The plant rests in a simple ceramic pot with a subtle neutral glaze, adding organic warmth to the environment.
A modern recessed ceiling light fixture with a flat, diffused glass panel. The fixture emits soft, uniform white illumination and has a minimalistic housing integrated into the ceiling.
A modern recessed ceiling light fixture with a flat, diffused glass panel. The fixture emits soft, uniform white illumination and has a minimalistic housing integrated into the ceiling.
